00035 /**
00036 * \file
00037 *                       Clock.
00038 * \author
00039 *                       Salvatore Pitrulli <salvopitru@users.sourceforge.net>
00040 */
00041 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00042 
00043 #include PLATFORM_HEADER
00044 #include "hal/error.h"
00045 #include "hal/hal.h"
00046 #include "dev/stm32w_systick.h"
00047 
00048 #include "contiki.h"
00049 
00050 #include "uart1.h"
00051 #include "dev/leds.h"
00052 #include "dev/stm32w-radio.h"
00053 
00054 #define DEBUG DEBUG_NONE
00055 #include "net/uip-debug.h"
00056 
00057 // The value that will be load in the SysTick value register.
00058 #define RELOAD_VALUE 24000-1   // 1 ms with a 24 MHz clock
00059 
00060 static volatile clock_time_t count;
00061 static volatile unsigned long current_seconds = 0;
00062 static unsigned int second_countdown = CLOCK_SECOND;
00063 
00064 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00065 void SysTick_Handler(void)
00066 {
00067 
00068   count++;
00069 
00070   if(etimer_pending()) {
00071     etimer_request_poll();
00072   }
00073   
00074   if (--second_countdown == 0) {
00075     current_seconds++;
00076     second_countdown = CLOCK_SECOND;
00077   }
00078   
00079 }
00080 
00081 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00082 
00083 void clock_init(void)
00084 { 
00085   
00086   ATOMIC(
00087 
00088   //Counts the number of ticks.
00089   count = 0;
00090   
00091   SysTick_CLKSourceConfig(SysTick_CLKSource_HCLK);
00092   SysTick_SetReload(RELOAD_VALUE);
00093   SysTick_ITConfig(ENABLE);
00094   SysTick_CounterCmd(SysTick_Counter_Enable);
00095   
00096   )
00097 
00098 }
00099 
00100 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00101 
00102 clock_time_t clock_time(void)
00103 {
00104   return count;
00105 }
00106 
00107 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00108 /**
00109  * Delay the CPU for a multiple of TODO
00110  */
00111 void clock_delay(unsigned int i)
00112 {
00113   for (; i > 0; i--) {          /* Needs fixing XXX */
00114     unsigned j;
00115     for (j = 50; j > 0; j--)
00116       asm ("nop");
00117   }
00118 }
00119 
00120 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00121 /**
00122  * Wait for a multiple of 1 ms.
00123  *
00124  */
00125 void clock_wait(int i)
00126 {
00127   clock_time_t start;
00128 
00129   start = clock_time();
00130   while(clock_time() - start < (clock_time_t)i);
00131 }
00132 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00133 
00134 unsigned long clock_seconds(void)
00135 {
00136   return current_seconds;
00137 }
00138 
00139 #include <stdio.h>
00140 
00141 void sleep_seconds(int seconds)
00142 {
00143   int32u quarter_seconds = seconds * 4;
00144   uint8_t radio_on;
00145 
00146 
00147   halPowerDown();
00148   radio_on = stm32w_radio_is_on();
00149   stm32w_radio_driver.off();
00150 
00151   halSleepForQsWithOptions(&quarter_seconds, 0);
00152 
00153 
00154   ATOMIC(
00155 
00156   halPowerUp();
00157 
00158   // Update OS system ticks.
00159   current_seconds += seconds - quarter_seconds / 4 ; // Passed seconds
00160   count += seconds * CLOCK_SECOND - quarter_seconds * CLOCK_SECOND / 4 ;
00161 
00162   if(etimer_pending()) {
00163     etimer_request_poll();
00164   }
00165 
00166   SysTick_CLKSourceConfig(SysTick_CLKSource_HCLK);
00167   SysTick_SetReload(RELOAD_VALUE);
00168   SysTick_ITConfig(ENABLE);
00169   SysTick_CounterCmd(SysTick_Counter_Enable);
00170 
00171   )
00172 
00173   stm32w_radio_driver.init();
00174   if(radio_on){
00175           stm32w_radio_driver.on();
00176   }
00177 
00178   uart1_init(115200);
00179   leds_init();
00180   rtimer_init();
00181 
00182   PRINTF("WakeInfo: %04x\r\n", halGetWakeInfo());
00183 
00184 
00185 }
